// golfing 1498 chars "The Plastic Ratio" by chronos. https://shadertoy.com/view/MXdGR7

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy, 
          U = ( u - .5*R ) / R.y;                    // normalized coordinates
    float M = 250.,                                  // max_num_points
          T = 12.5,                                  // duration
          t = mod(iTime, T),
          N = min( .24* min(T-t, t), 1.) * M,
          w = 1./R.y, i;

    for( O *= 0.; i < N; i++ )
        abs(U.x) < .5 ?                              // clamp to square
            O[ int( 3.*i /(M-1.) ) ]                 // point color
                 += smoothstep( w, -w,               // plastic numbers 
                                length( U +.5 - fract( i * vec2(.754877, .56984) ) )
                                - .34 / sqrt(N) ) :i;// draw AA disc
     
  
}
